input.sentences: walking along a quiet trail is a great way to see the many treasures that mother nature gives us .
there are beautiful flowers growing high up on tree trunks .
the flowers dress themselves in lots of different colors .
but the colors of the flowers are not the only wonders | these leaves look soft and leathery .
the treasures of mother nature come in many colors | textures and unique shapes !
output.sentences: Today we will explore the wonders of the forest trails.
Beside this tree trunk we find our first beautiful flower.
This next flower is very rare to see.
For this flower the leaves nearly encapsulate it.
Finally, we discover the most prized flower- a bearded orchid.
